name: Volley-Ball
description:
Volley-Ball is a true to life version of the popular sports game Volleyball. It is a game about keeping an orange ball off the ground because it does not like being there.

This game was made as a challenge to myself to make a one day game.

control your player with a,s or k,l
Keep the ball off the ground

Hold r to reset, or wait without input for 30 seconds

Hold esc to quit
